3.1.name: wordpress/design-approval-system
3.1.description:
NEW IN 3.1: Project Board. Now clients, projects, & designs are organized on one page + Clients can login to see there designs! View Live Example. SMTP options now available on the settings page, and Designers can now add there email to a design post to also receive email notifications.

NOW LAUNCHED Don't want to set it all up or worry about plugin conflicts on your personal website? Let us do all the work! Get an account on wpdas.com.
